PRESENTS YOU...
GTA SAN ANDREAS N00B EDITION

_/ _/ _/ _/

--> More info and screenshots: http://marques999.buildmy.ws/main <--

Known Issues:
- If you enter the car on the showrooom of Otto&#039;s Autos the game will crash
- If you tune the body parts of the cars the game will crash (I&#039;ll limit the tuning to Nitro and Colour per car soon)
- The game may crash if you use too many times the menus

Features:
- Weather Menu
- Car Spawn Menu
- Clothes Menu
- Car Showroom in Otto&#039;s Autos
- GTA N00bmode V2 (car spawner, teleporter, infinite car and player, inifnite &#039;ultra&#039; nitrous oxide, homie creation, weapon spawner, super bike skill, car bomb mod, car flip mod and more)
- Almost every trucks, vans and cars replaced by realistic real life cars
- SA-MP (San Andreas Multiplayer) included
- McDonalds, Pizza Hut and Subway replaced Burger Shot, Pizza Stack and Cluckin&#039; Bell
- Replaced radio stations
- And much more $h!T

This will certainly take you 3 days to download (my connection has a 200 kbps (25 KB/s) upload speed
